Manage Application Configurations

JBI Component Application Configurations are named collections of properties that allow Service Assemblies to configure a target component. Click Add Configuration to create a new named set of configured properties. Click the name of an application configuration to view or modify its properties.

Name
{{configuration}}
Unable to manage application configurations while {{component.name}} is in shutdown state !
{{component.name}} does not support application configurations.
